sectionSubtitle: Real results for real clients across industries.

stories.challenge: High employee turnover in a fast-growing software company.
stories.solution: Implemented a structured onboarding program and leadership training.
stories.results: Attrition dropped by 35% and employee satisfaction scores rose by 22%.

stories.challenge: Difficulty attracting qualified nurses to a regional hospital.
stories.solution: Developed a targeted recruitment campaign and improved benefits package.
stories.results: Vacancy rate reduced by 50% and time-to-hire cut in half.

stories.challenge: Low customer service ratings and high seasonal staff turnover.
stories.solution: Introduced customer service training and flexible scheduling.
stories.results: Customer satisfaction increased by 18% and seasonal retention improved by 40%.
